mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MU_NOTICE ( NOTI_IDX, NOTI_SUBJECT, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_WRITER, NOTI_WRITE_DATE, NOTI_HIT ) VALUES ( MU_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noti_subject}, #{noti_content}, 'admin', SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT NN.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, N.* FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME, N.* FROM MU_NOTICE N JOIN MU_MEMBER M ON N.NOTI_WRITER = M.MEM_ID WHERE N.NOTI_DEL_STATUS IS NULL ORDER BY NOTI_IDX DESC ) N ) NN WHERE RN = 1
SELECT COUNT(NOTI_IDX) FROM MU_NOTICE WHERE NOTI_DEL_STATUS IS NULL

SELECT NN.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, N.* FROM ( SELECT NOTI_IDX, NOTI_WRITER, NOTI_SUBJECT, NOTI_WRITE_DATE, NOTI_HIT FROM MU_NOTICE WHERE NOTI_DEL_STATUS IS NULL ORDER BY NOTI_IDX DESC ) N ) NN WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME, N.* FROM MU_NOTICE N JOIN MU_MEMBER M ON N.NOTI_WRITER = M.MEM_ID WHERE NOTI_IDX = #{noti_idx}
SELECT COUNT(NOTI_IDX) FROM MU_NOTICE WHERE (NOTI_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%') OR (NOTI_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%') AND (NOTI_DEL_STATUS IS NULL) ORDER BY NOTI_IDX DESC
